description: Intent to fully decompose a PRD following the Divide et Impera safe execution flow (L2 -> L3 -> L1)

actions.description: L2 Analyzer: Converts Markdown PRD to backlog.json deterministically
L3 Validator: Queries ADO via Read-Only calls to generate execution_plan.json (WhatIf enforced)
L1 Executor: Blindly executes execution_plan.json on ADO (Requires Human Approval Gate before this step)
